channel.title: Angel Dust/The Hum/Snakes - Hern [Experimental]
channel.description:
3 new, short tracks. These are being released as a teaser for my next album, which is sort of a concept album. All of the tracks are under two minutes, which is why I will be releasing singles in groups of 3 for this album cycle. The album will be a cerebral and psychedelic experience, which will either draw you in or confuse you.
Well, the SoundCloud link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/angel-dust-the-hum-snakes
I should be posting it on Audius in the next coming days, so for now I will just link my account: http://audius.co/hern
Here is the album art: ![image0|500x500](upload://8c20YXbk10Ksj8HUtMxvGxpng6m.jpeg)
Constructive criticism is welcome as always. Hope you enjoy. (You'll probably just be confused tho)
